name: Data engineer
description:
We are looking to complement our existing team with a Data Engineer who will work closely with our team of Analysts and Software Engineers to deliver robust data pipelines that can fuel our increasingly ambitious endeavours to leverage our data.

Our client is a telecommunication company that routinely handles tens of TB of data on a daily basis.

You will play a key role in the scaling of our organisation-wide usage of data and will progressively have exposure to a range of topics that our team is working on, from data warehousing & business intelligence through to supporting the scaled use of machine learning & advanced data science techniques.


We have existing pipelines built on AWS with Pyspark, Athena and Python.
You would help us to build more pipelines, and also to optimize and improve existing ones.

This role requires a number of technical skills, specifically Python (1-3 years), PySpark (1-3 years) and SQL.

This position is fully remote.

Language: English is required

Salary: 1000 ~ 3000 GBP/ month
